biography: Holly Hollywood was born Stacey Leigh Mobley on December 2, 1974 in Los Gatos, California. She's of German, Irish, and Native American descent. Holly began her acting career in soft-core movies in the mid 1990's. Hollywood made the leap to explicit hardcore films in her mid 20's in 2000. Hollywood retired from the adult film industry in 2010. The mother of a special needs daughter, Hollywood has done volunteer work for various charities. Moreover, Holly enjoys skydiving and snowboarding
name: Holly Hollywood
